summary: I WAS READING CODE 30126, USED MOTOR VEHICLES.  IT IS NOT SPECIFIC ABOUT WHICH SAFETY HAZARDS ARE ENFORCED BY THE LAW.  I WANT TO KNOW  WHAT GIVES A DEALER A RIGHT TO SELL A USED VEHICLE WHICH HAS A BENT AND CRACKED FRAME AND A CLEAN TITLE.  NO "AS IS " SALE SHOULD BE A JUSTIFICATION FOR LACK OF SAFETY REGARDING HUMAN LIFE.  HE WILL NOT REFUND MY MONEY. IS THIS LEGAL?  WHAT ARE MY RIGHTS? PLEASE ADVISE.  THANK YOU. *JB
